product_name: BIC Sport ACE-TEC Cross Stand Up Paddleboard - 11'
long_description: With full rail-to-rail volume for extended stability, this versatile paddleboard has plenty of room for fishing, a padded platform for yoga, and ample flotation for larger paddlers.
short_description: With full rail-to-rail volume for extended stability, this versatile paddleboard has plenty of room for fishing, a padded platform for yoga, and ample flotation for larger paddlers.
